description:
Take a little pleasant trip through a big and lovely illustration!
Start with a monochrome scenery and fill it with colour! Kick back, relax, and find all the cats to reveal the final, colourful landscape.

Features:
- Nearly a thousand cats and other things to find - a treat for kittycat petters :) 
- Two main modes, six bonus levels, andâ€¦ a grand, final challenge!
- Special cat cards to collect
- Tons of meows :)
name: Hidden Cats in Berlin
